title: Authenticity-Based E-Learning Professional Development Program for Higher Education Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning platforms and college-level course facilitation
context.additional_context: A program for university-affiliated corporate educators teaching mathematics, focusing on strengthening actual lecture design and implementation competencies

learning_goals: Learners can develop mathematics curriculum modules by applying authentic e-learning design principles.
Learners can execute at least three interaction strategies to enhance student engagement in online learning environments.
Learners can improve educational effectiveness by over 20% by applying an iterative lecture improvement process based on feedback loops.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)
Digital Content Creation Tools (Screen Casting, PPT Converter)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
